candidates.comment: This video covers the basics of Op-Amps and how they work. An Op-Amp is a high gain differential amplifier, and these devices are extremely cheap, with some being as low as 10 cents in price. Op-amps have high input and low output impedances. Op-amps were first created with vacuum tubes, which makes sense as vacuum tubes were also used to construct instrument amplifiers as well. The same Op-Amp can be used in different circuit designs to create varying results, such as high and low pass filters.
candidates.url: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_HHxV-7alwE: Basic of Op-Amps - Using Operational Amplifiers
